software_update.check_network_cable_connection: Make sure the network cable is connected

installer_login.wrong_email_or_password: Wrong email or password. Please try again!
installer_login.wrong_system_installer: You are not the installer of this system, therefore you will not be able to finish the installation

customer_info.customer_same_as_installer: The customer email cannot be same as the installer email. Please use another email address!
customer_info.wrong_customer_installer: You do not have access to the customer with this email address. Please use another email address!

system_detect.please_connect_inverter: Please connect your Inverter to the LiveX
system_detect.inverter_not_registered: Your Inverter is not registered in our Database

system_setup.batteries_serialnumber: Please enter the S/N of each battery connected to the system.
system_setup.pv_system_feed_in_limitation: How much percent of solar power can be fed to grid in terms of peak power?
system_setup.inverter_registered_with_other_system: Inverter already registered with another system!
system_setup.battery_not_exist_or_registered_with_oth: Battery does not exist or is already registered with another system!
system_setup.lifepo_communication_problem: Communication Problem between Inverter and Battery Modules
system_setup.emeter_phase_connected: Please indicate to which output phase of the Energy Meter the input of the inverter has been connected.
system_setup.livex_not_registered: Your liveX is not registered in our database. Please contact your batterX Partner to resolve this.
system_setup.pv_size_very_low: The size of the PV-System seems very low.
system_setup.pv_size_very_low_confirm: Please confirm that the size is only 100 Wp, or cancel and change it to the correct value.

system_test.turn_input_off: Turn off the solar and input breaker
system_test.please_turn_solar_off: Please turn OFF the solar breaker
system_test.please_turn_input_off: Please turn OFF the solar and input breaker
system_test.please_turn_input_on: Please turn ON the solar and input breaker
system_test.please_turn_output_on: Please turn ON the UPS Output

summary.name: Name
summary.confirm_load_final: As part of the installation routine, the installing technician has confirmed that the UPS load, including inrush and start-up currents, is correctly designed or, in the event of overloads with available mains, will be reduced to the permissible level within 1 month of the installation date, which is a prerequisite for the validity of the product warranty. It is pointed out that according to the warranty conditions overloads in UPS mode will invalidate the warranty.
summary.confirm_box: I hereby confirm that the information above is true, complete and accurate.
summary.confirm_load_box: It is hereby confirmed that the UPS load, including inrush and start-up currents, is correctly designed or, in the event of overloads with available mains, will be reduced to the permissible level within 1 month of the installation date, which is a prerequisite for the validity of the product warranty. It is pointed out that according to the warranty conditions overloads in UPS mode will invalidate the warranty.
summary.final_p1: The installation of the batterX Home System was successfully completed and an e-mail with a confirmation link was sent to the customer.
summary.final_p2: By clicking the confirmation link the customer can start using the batterX Portal for remote monitoring and control of his batterX Home System.
summary.final_p3: As the installer of the System you get full access to this batterX Home from your own account as well, so that you can offer remote support to your customer if necessary.
summary.final_p4: We automatically uploaded the Installation-Report to the batterX Cloud, but we also recommend that you download the PDF File and store it locally.
summary.final_p5: We also recommend that you restart the liveX once, by pressing the button below.
summary.final_p6: The batterX Portal can be found at the following link
